message: Monsieur MooMoo! We are overjoyed at your presence today!
action1: The pleaure is all mine, js!

message: We picked up a bottle of Malbec for you to enjoy as you peruse the gallery today.
I do. I really do. It's totally not a bribe intended to sway you into voting my gallery first place in the contest.
action1: I would never think that. You're a straight shooter!
